entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shilo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carberry 11:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %

Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
